name: huggingface_scrape_dataset
description: Scrape a Hugging Face dataset page. Returns name, description, tags, download count, and dataset card.

steps.code: const title = document.querySelector('h1')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const tags = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/datasets?"]')).slice(0,10).map(t=>t.textContent.trim()); const licenseEl = document.querySelector('a[href*="choosealicense"], a[href*="/datasets?license="]'); const license = licenseEl?.textContent?.trim()||''; const card = document.querySelector('.prose')?.innerText?.substring(0,3000)||''; const dlEl = document.querySelector('[title*="download"], [title*="Download"]'); const downloads = dlEl?.textContent?.trim()||''; return { title, tags, license, downloads, card_content: card, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
